comments:
Using Eclipse 3.3 M5

This one is rather tricky to pin on anyone... There are 3 stack traces that seem to be related in that they all happened at the same second.  Other than that, I'm not sure of much.  Clearly this could be 3 separate bugs.  I apologize for the lack of details.

Not much I can do without steps and the source code that caused this.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 163554 ***
